price: (30) And he who believed said, "O my people, indeed I fear for you [a fate] like the day of the companies[1369] -
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِيٓ ءَامَنَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُم مِّثۡلَ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابِ
footnotes: [1369]- i.e., the days on which Allāh sent His punishment upon those who rejected their prophets in former times.
